description:
Whilst repairing the quad in the garage, Justin Matthews suddenly finds himself trapped underneath it. It's not pressing on him but he is stuck. Luckily Johnny B has come around to check on him, otherwise Justin would just be laying by himself alone in a garage, but that still doesn't solve the problem of how to get Justin free. Johnny thinks he has an idea- if Justin can just get a little more sweaty, maybe he can shimmy on out from underneath. The plan sounds good to him, but he's not sure how to work up a sweat in this position. Fortunately, Johnny has the perfect idea how to make that happen. Justin may soon discover that he rather enjoys being trapped.

Enjoy!
title: Trapped Down Deep
